entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Big Number Support for the Dashboard
  • https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/130 - Working to address - Subpath reverse proxy support

For Big Number Dashboard Support

For the Subpath Reverse Proxy

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/464 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.2...7.0.3

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Hover Stats

- Circular Icon

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/465 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.3...7.0.4

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • For tally display on front, removed confusing date and shows the exact number (helpful when you see 17.7K for main)
  • For tally display on front, changed MIL to M, BIL to B, and TRI to T (for million, billion, and trillion) (futureproofing)

  • Removed stop logo when red indicator is full (looked repetitive)

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/468

  • chore: bump version from 7.0.4 to 7.0.5 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/469 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.4...7.0.5

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

I am proud to announce Huntarr now installs on Windows and also installs as a service! Took me 3 tries over the last 3 weeks, probably spending about 30 hours the windows portion alone (keep in mind you can now install for mac also)

Pending quick build issue... will repost.

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/475 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.5...7.0.6

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

I am proud to announce Huntarr now installs on Windows and also installs as a service! Took me 3 tries over the last 3 weeks, probably spending about 30 hours the windows portion alone (keep in mind you can now install for mac also)

7.0.7+ now names provides the windows installer a better name when publishing

Pending quick build issue... will repost.

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/475 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.5...7.0.6

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.6...7.0.7
